tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneExpression (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    expression_level FLOAT,
    cell_type_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (cell_type_id) REFERENCES CellTypes(cell_type_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Expression (
  expression_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  cell_type_id UUID,
  gene_id UUID,
  expression_level FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (cell_type_id) REFERENCES CellType(cell_type_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ExpressionLevels (
    expression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_type_id INT NOT NULL,
    gene_id INT NOT NULL,
    expression_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (cell_type_id) REFERENCES CellTypes(cell_type_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MechanismAssociations (
    association_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cell_type_id INT NOT NULL,
    mechanism_id INT NOT NULL,
    association_strength FLOAT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (cell_type_id) REFERENCES CellTypes(cell_type_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mechanism_id) REFERENCES DiseaseMechanisms(mechanism_id)
);
